plot: An author who was sent to the town Drakho, because of a nervous breakdown, gets wound up in a mysterious mystery about demons and werewolves. She starts seeing ghosts and dismisses them as her own imagination, but when they turn out to be real she starts to get suspicious of the odd town and of its past.   Written by  Matt Dotzenroth
title: Pueblo maldito

lists.title: Estupidos y sensuales (no todos) chupasangres y sus peluditas y licantropas mascotas.
